CustomField.formula: AND ( OR( UPPER(TEXT(Business_Unit__c)) = "RESPIRATORY", UPPER(TEXT(Business_Unit__c)) = "UROLOGY", UPPER(TEXT(Business_Unit__c)) = "ANESTHESIA", UPPER(TEXT(Business_Unit__c)) = "EMS", UPPER(TEXT(Business_Unit__c)) = "ALTERNATE CARE", UPPER(TEXT(Business_Unit__c)) = "SURGICAL DISPOSABLES", UPPER(TEXT(Business_Unit__c)) = "SURGICAL INSTRUMENTS" ), OR(Country="US", Country ="USA", Country = "United States of America", Country = "United States", Country="us") )
CustomField.label: Eloqua Sync
